calculateOrderPrice() - Method in class presentation.OrderDesign
This method calculates the total price of the order
Client - Class in model
The class Client represents an object having the same attributes as the table Client from the database

This method represents a default constructor of the Client class

This method represents a constructor of the Client class

This method represents a constructor of the Client class
ClientBLL - Class in bll
The class ClientBLL uses the methods from the dao package in order to check the results of the Client related queries
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class bll.ClientBLL
This method represents the constructor of the class ClientBLL and creates a list of validators for the client and also a new instance of the ClientDAO
ClientDAO - Class in dao
The class ClientDAO inherits all methods from class AbstractDAO of generic type Client
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dao.ClientDAO
This method represents the constructor of the ClientDAO class
ClientDesign - Class in presentation
The class ClientDesign is a controller class for the windows regarding operations on clients: add, edit, view, delete
